backend/main.mo: Defines backend types and state for site content, riders, applications, and delivery orders with admin‑gated initialization and mixins for auth and storage.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a no-op migration function that returns the input state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries of many frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining CSS variables for theming, including light and dark mode palettes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting meta tags, app title, and loading the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures routing, theming, and React Query providers, defining all main site routes within a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Admin panel to view, create, update, assign, and manage delivery orders with dialogs and mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRider: Shows a table of rider profiles with details like mobile, area, bike availability, and assigned orders.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Restricts access to admin pages by checking user role and showing an access denied message if not authorized.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the brand logo image with title and tagline text.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Displays a fixed WhatsApp contact button linking to a prefilled message.
frontend/src/components/FounderCard.tsx: Shows a founder profile card with image fallback, role, and a short message.
Wraps content in themed gradient or translucent background sections based on variant selection.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links, contact buttons, and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/HomeServicesCate: Displays a grid of service categories with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication with status feedback.
frontend/src/components/MapEmbed.tsx: Embeds a Google Maps iframe showing Bikaner location within a styled container.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryCTAs.tsx: Provides primary call-to-action buttons for WhatsApp ordering and phone calls.
frontend/src/components/ProofAndTrustSec: Shows trust-building features in cards highlighting proof of delivery and updates.
frontend/src/components/RateTable.tsx: Renders a table of distance-based parcel rates with formatted prices.
frontend/src/components/RiderApplication: Rider application form with validation, modal dialog, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/RiderGuard.tsx: Protects rider-only routes by requiring authentication and showing login prompt.
frontend/src/components/ServiceList.tsx: Grid of service offering cards with icons, titles, and short descriptions.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with brand info, quick links, contact details, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, and floating WhatsApp CTA.
frontend/src/components/Steps.tsx: Displays a responsive grid of step cards showing number, title, and description.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Provides centralized contact config and a helper to build WhatsApp links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login handling, identity persistence, and provider setup.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates document title and meta tags for description and keywords.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating site content, rates, users, riders, and orders.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color themes with light/dark mode and gradient utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing site content, delivery rates, orders, and rider applications with CRUD actions and tabbed UI.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page showing phone, WhatsApp options, and a form that opens a prefilled WhatsApp message using a template.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero section, WhatsApp booking link, service highlights, and promotional sections like trust proof and rider applications.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains the delivery process in four steps with visual cards and additional details on benefits and transparency.
frontend/src/pages/RateCardPage.tsx: Displays distance‑based delivery pricing fetched from the backend along with notes about fuel efficiency and transparent rates.
frontend/src/pages/RiderPage.tsx: Rider portal page that lists assigned deliveries, allows status updates, and supports proof‑of‑delivery photo uploads with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services overview page showing delivery categories with metadata setup and a gradient-themed layout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Functions to generate WhatsApp message links and format Indian phone numbers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and content paths for the project.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, design goals, images, and architectural notes for the Bikaner Express Delivery site.
